memberdef.name: vfcn_error
memberdef.initializer: utils_error().forced_throw(local_info,"This virtual function (of SubSpectrum object) has not been overridden in the derived class! (name = "+getName()+")")

briefdescription.para: Helper macro for throwing errors in base class versions of virtual functions.

detaileddescription.para: Abstract class for accessing general spectrum information.
